= Introduction =

This area will describe the Hermes SDR Setup being used @ NW0W for "CDAR"

  * [https://code.google.com/p/cdar/wiki/RackMountSystem RackMount System]
  * [https://code.google.com/p/cdar/wiki/50Mhz_1kw_Lumped_Element_PIN_SWITCH_NW0W_BUILD HIGH PWR TR SWITCH] and [https://code.google.com/p/cdar/wiki/50Mhz_1kw_Lumped_Element_PIN_SWITCH here]
  * [https://code.google.com/p/cdar/wiki/Hermes Hermes]

= Details =

  * 12VDC via PSS12-100
  * 19" Rack
  * Low-Power Safety TR Pin Switches
  * Low-Power 50Ohm Dummy load(s) to switch out TX and RX safely to.
  * Elecraft PR6 LNA
  * SMA to RG400 from TX to PA
  * SMA to RG400 to RX from LNA
  * GPSDO
